pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial ARCH and GARCH Models (spGARCH) // A collection of functions to deal with spatial and spatiotemporal autoregressive conditional heteroscedasticity (spatial ARCH and GARCH models) by Otto, Schmid, Garthoff (2017) arXiv:1609.00711: simulation of spatial ARCH-type processes (spARCH, exponential spARCH, complex spARCH); quasi-maximum- likelihood estimation of the parameters of spARCH models and spatial autoregressive models with spARCH disturbances, diagnostic checks, visualizations.
